actions.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the disclosure to governmental authorities by electronic communication providers of the names and addresses associated with phone numbers supplied by such authorities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to permit electronic communication providers to disclose the following information to a governmental entity: (1) any publicly available information; and (2) the name and address associated with a phone number provided by such entity. (Current law requires an administrative subpoena, warrant, court order, or consent before such information can be provided.)

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the disclosure to governmental authorities by electronic communication providers of the names and addresses associated with phone numbers supplied by such authorities, and for other purposes.
